explains: adv. 用魔法地；如魔法般地

sentences.en: During the holiday season the town is magically transformed into a Christmas wonderland.
sentences.cn: 在节日期间该镇魔法般地变成了圣诞仙境。

sentences.en: The guilt-prone ones shared more, even though they hadn't magically become more sympathetic to the other child's deprivation.
sentences.cn: 那些有负罪感倾向的孩子分享得更多，尽管他们并没有神奇地对另一个孩子的不幸表现出更多的同情。

sentences.en: If you want your kids to have strong self-esteem and the confidence that they can solve hard problems, those qualities won't magically materialize in high school.
sentences.cn: 如果你想让你的孩子拥有强烈的自尊心和解决困难问题的自信，这些品质不会在高中神奇地实现。
